    • getDirectoryHandler

      public static IDirectoryHandlerSpecification getDirectoryHandler(String rootPathString) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, GeneralSecurityException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets directory handler.
      Parameters:
      rootPathString - path to the root directory.
      Returns:
      IDirectoryHandlerSpecification specification.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      GeneralSecurityException - if Google Drive fails to authorize.
